front.title: IEEE/IEC Approved Draft International Standard for Subsea Equipment - Power Connectors, Penetrators and Jumper Assemblies with Rated Voltage from 3 kV (Umax = 3.6 kV) to 30 kV (Umax = 36 kV)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document is applicable to single and three-phase wet-mateable and dry-mateable AC connectors, penetrators and jumper assemblies with rated voltages from 3 kV (Umax = 3,6 kV) to 30 kV (Umax = 36 kV). This document relates to the requirements and tests for products in the “as manufactured and supplied” condition. This document is not applicable to requirements and tests for products that have been subsequently installed, deployed or retrieved.
